General.Name: Xinyu Iron & Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinyu Iron & Steel Co., Ltd produces and sells iron and steel products in China. The company offers high-speed wire rods, cold and hot rolled sheets, wide and thick plates, special steel, silicon steel, steel strand, steel wire, electronic steel, and metal products. It also engages in the ferrous metal smelting and forging processing and sales; metal products processing and sales; cable and wire manufacturing and sales; chemical raw materials and chemical products production and sales; general equipment manufacturing, installation, maintenance, and sales; pressure vessel manufacturing; industrial oil testing; lifting machinery installation and maintenance; road general cargo transportation; first-class vehicle maintenance; warehousing and leasing services; import and export of goods; computer, communication, and other electronic equipment manufacturing and maintenance; instrumentation manufacturing and maintenance; and software and information technology services. In addition, the company offers coal tar, coal phenol, crude benzene, coal tar pitch, coking naphthalene, anthracene oil, washing oil, sulfur, oxygen, liquid oxygen, nitrogen, liquid nitrogen, argon, liquid argon, dephenolized oil, and sulfuric acid. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions, including the United States, the European Union, Japan, Southeast Asia, and other countries. The company is headquartered in Xinyu, China. Xinyu Iron & Steel Co., Ltd (SHSE:600782) operates as a subsidiary of Wuhan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd.

1.Name: Mr. Meilin  Lu
1.Title: CFO, Director & Board of Directors Sec.
